lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Winston Churchill announced yesterday a moral victory in the British evacuation of Greece as Finland -- which fought the good fight last year only to succumb to the mass strength of aggression -- again came into the news.
abstract: H W Baldwin on German troop transit through Finland

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
